title: Senator Cory Gardner On Addressing Mass Shootings While Respecting The 2nd Amendment
text:
Senator Cory Gardner (R-CO) joined Brian Kilmeade to discuss President Trump's upcoming address to the United Nations General Assembly, Congress working on investigating the dangers of teenage vaping, whether congress can address mass shootings with new gun legislation while not infringing on the 2nd Amendment and why he feels it is a possibility that former Colorado Governor John Hickenlooper will not be his opponent as he seeks re-election in November.

Plus, Senator Gardner explains how the privacy bill he is set to introduce will make sure manufactures clearly state on their packaging if the product includes a camera or microphone.

Watch here:
